channel.title: Server Offline
channel.description:
[center][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?action=view&server=ub3rx.servegame.com]My Server Status Page[/url]
[img]http://ub3rxss.tk/[/img]
[img]http://img143.imageshack.us/img143/5177/okais.jpg[/img]
All of these things say that my server is online. Yet people try to connect and it comes up with error connecting to server. This is a puzzler. Any ideas, maby it's port 80... I hope not.

item.title: Server Offline
item.dc:creator: @Oh_Hai Oh Hai
item.description:
@Oh_Hai wrote:

Yea i do. But im unsure of trusting a stranger, explain ? I have all info there.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Offline
item.dc:creator: @Oh_Hai Oh Hai
item.description:
@Oh_Hai wrote:

Actually a few weeks ago some one connected and I posted an advertisment for “test” and use the same no-ip (ub3rx.servegame.com) and used port 80…

Recently i got steam, left4dead and other games but i didnt think that’s the problem.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2009, 02:31:11 am[/size][hr]NOTHING IS WORKING!!!

Read full topic

item.description:
@Oh_Hai wrote:

I did. Unless it has to be my wireless IP? But that’s 10.1.1.1 and that’s stupid.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2009, 06:22:08 pm[/size][hr]No matter what even when my computer is off, it seems it’s online with port 80. Yet as you can see I’ve open 43594 and when i run it off of that port it wont work, can someone please help me.

[b]NOPE NOTHING CHANGED! It’s giving me the shits, I opened 43594 & 43595 both dont make it online. And I’m not using hamachi.
